show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
Prescriptions for Health: Most cancer is preventable now. Fast food causes depression. Steroids cause osteoporosis in... <!--more--> only 3 months A dysfunctional side of medicine….
Caller: Allen (Boston) - Why does frozen organic food have so much salt?
Vicki’s 20:20 Tips - #1 Laughter is the Best Medicine, #2 - Gems and Truths for Mental Health and More   LOL
